name: PiG BiRD 2
description:
This game was my passion project! It took me 3 months to make :)

It is a runner type game where you have to avoid clouds coming towards you. The idea is that you are creating a melody as you are flying the pig bird and interacting with items objects in the levels.

The control is simple, any button on your keyboard or mouse. Keep pressing any button of your choice to fly.

The pick up (star) will give different fun powers, it is up to you to discover them!

Can you last 5 min (300 s) and pass the second level? ;)

Each point reduces the time, so catch that pigeon!

Oh, and watch out for the lighthouse
